iWant: the chatbot to not only provide suggestions that already fit whatever information the person provides but also well argumented suggestions from other fields
soThat: it might cause some broadening of the personal horizon and "thinking outside of the box"
because: I know that one cannot imagine oneself in jobs and fields one doesn't know about (or hasn't been suggested to be a good fit for before).
desirable: help with reflecting why something is not interesting to the person. "Do you want to see some out-of-the-box recommendations" - button
acceptable: for every suggestion fitting the answers also one countersuggestion
dealBreakers: strictly limited suggestions based on person's answer, historical stereotypes and biases

values.explanation: other options increase likelihood of personal growth
diversity of backgrounds for different professions
